element.name: Gardiner's Treat by Bootle, Webcam Cache (1/1)
element.long-description:
This webcam cache is located at the junction of Gardiner Street and Talbot Street in North Dublin. You will need two people for this cache, one to visit the site and one to stay in front of a PC to save a picure of your visit. All you need to do is go to the coordinates listed above with your GPS and a mobile phone. The best place is probably the traffic island in the middle of the street. When you are there, phone your friend who is sitting in front of the PC. They need to log on to this site - (visit link) Confirm that they can see you with your GPS. Then they should save the picture by right clicking their mouse and choosing to "Save Picture As". Confirm that the picture is saved properly before you leave the spot!. Then log your find and picture here!
NOTE: Only photos taken from the webcam will be accepted. Street level photos will have their logs deleted.

ul.li:
2010-06-08T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by Die-3-Fragezeichen
Used this cam to greet rest of team at home :-) TFTC 3???

2010-06-06T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by de Bontjes
Our first webcam cache. We are on the picture together with 4-voeters. T4tc

2010-06-06T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by 4voeters
Nice to do a webcam cache again. Always nice to log this once and a while. Thanks to Jaap Gaai who took the foto from Bergen op Zoom, The Netherlands at 19:50, Dutch time. Two teams are on the picture: 4voeters and De Bontjes

2010-06-02T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by eve1987
Funny ... the photo took a friend in Austria [:D]
Photo is already online with the log from GudrunXY!
TFTC and kind regards from Austria, eve

2010-05-25T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by tmob
#2400
We looked for this cache during our holidays in Ireland. Six fantastic days, 1800kms driven, and a bunch of caches found. Definitely a great way to get to know this beautiful island!
It's always nice to find this webcam caches, well, at least when the camera is still working like this one [:d]. At first we had some doubts to where was the camera pointing, but after a phone call we figured out the right place. Thanks to our friend [url=http://www.geocaching.com/profile/?guid=9aae07e1-9f38-45e4-bf2d-9129af054cb5]SUp3rFM[/url] for saving the camera picture.
Thanks for this one... Greetings from Portugal

2008-10-13T19:00:00Z : Webcam Photo Taken by Kersti.com
This has been on the todo list for some time and to be honest I'm just tired of seeing it on the map so I figured it was time to finally get around to doing it!

wpt.name: GCJKTN
wpt.desc: Gardiner's Treat by Bootle, Webcam Cache (1/1)
